Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.bbbb.data.Item.Item
public class Item extends Object
Represents an item in the menu, including its details and associated toppings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Item(int id, String name, ItemCategory category, BigDecimal price, List<Topping> toppings, int active)
    Constructs an Item object with the specified attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(int id, String name, ItemCategory category, BigDecimal price, List<Topping> toppings, int active)
      Constructs an Item object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the item.
      name - The name of the item.
      category - The category of the item.
      price - The price of the item.
      toppings - The list of toppings associated with the item.
      active - The active status of the item (1 for active, 0 for inactive).

  • Method Details

      public int getId()

    • getName

      public String getName()

      public ItemCategory getCategory()

    • getPrice

      public BigDecimal getPrice()

    • getToppings

      public List<Topping> getToppings()

    • getActive

      public int getActive()

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(BigDecimal price)

    • addTopping

      public void addTopping(Topping topping)
      Adds a topping to the item's internal topping list.
      Parameters:
      topping - The Topping to add to the item

    • setActive

      public void setActive(int active)
      Sets the active status of the item.
      Parameters:
      active - The new active status (1 for active, 0 for inactive).

    • hasTopping

      public boolean hasTopping(int toppingId)
      Checks if the item contains the specified topping.
      Parameters:
      toppingId - The ID of the topping to check.
      Returns:
      True if the topping is present in the item's topping list; False otherwise.

    • getTopping

      public Topping getTopping(int toppingId)
      Retrieves the topping with the specified ID from the item's topping list.
      Parameters:
      toppingId - The ID of the topping to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Topping with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • updateToppingQuantity

      public void updateToppingQuantity(int toppingId, ToppingQuantity quantity)
      Updates the quantity of a topping in the item's topping list. If the quantity is ToppingQuantity.NONE, the topping is removed.
      Parameters:
      toppingId - The ID of the topping to update.
      quantity - The new quantity for the topping.
